project.description: Sets up the test environment by copying over files needed from the master. Especially useful since EC2 nodes can't connect *back* to the master.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PARENT_JOB
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The build job that spawned the test job.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PARENT_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The unique id of the build job that spawned the test job.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TEST_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the slave which will be running the test, used to ssh to it.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: WORKING_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The working directory on the slave in which to put the test files.
